title: Drawing, "Hercules in the Garden of the Hesperides", 1805
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
markings: Watermark: lion rampant, turned toward left, above crown, below FS.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Hercules shown resting in pose of Hercules Farnese. Dead dragon lies behind him.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hercules in the Garden of the Hesperides", 1805.
1805. Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3255.
